rules_text:
Reveal the top six cards of your library. You may cast a noncreature spell with mana value 4 or less from among them without paying its mana cost. If you don't, put a noncreature card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Jump-start [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)[/i]
